forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a serene blanket of sunshine, casting a warm embrace over the city. With temperatures hovering gracefully around 65 degrees, the gentle breeze from the west brings a refreshing touch, keeping the day pleasant as it nudges the warmth ever so slightly downward. The horizon unfurls, showcasing vibrant cityscapes that stretch toward the bay, kissed by pristine blue skies—a splendid canvas devoid of fog. 

As the evening settles in, the coolness will glide down to about 50 degrees, inviting a soft layer of clouds that whisper of the night ahead. Those venturing out might choose light layers to adapt to the temperature dip, perhaps a light sweater over a shirt to remain comfortable while absorbing the city’s evening charms. With such inviting conditions, a stroll along the waterfront beckons, where one can bask in the soft glow of the setting sun, watch ferries dance on the water, or seek out a cozy café to watch the world pass by, enjoying the simple pleasures life offers on this lovely San Francisco day.
